metadata.title: CVE-2023-39947 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: eprosima Fast DDS is a C++ implementation of the Data Distribution Servicestandard of the Object Management Group. Prior to versions 2.11.1, 2.10.2,2.9.2, and 2.6.6, even after the fix at commit 3492270, malformed`PID_PROPERTY_LIST` parameters cause heap overflow at a different programcounter. This can remotely crash any Fast-DDS process. Versions 2.11.1,2.10.2, 2.9.2, and 2.6.6 contain a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: fastdds package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
